DOC.brief_summary: This program utilize community-engaged research approach implement evaluate program seek reduce sexual risk behavior among Black adult heterosexual men . The investigator aim assess impact linguistically culturally tailor HIV prevention program sexual risk heterosexual , African American men age 18 old , assess intervention 's impact proximal social psychosocial variable program design change , identify key contextual level factor may impact intervention 's impact across segment priority population .
